program.name: Drakensang - Int'l - Non Incent
program.description: <span style="font-weight:bold;">Browsergame<br><br></span>DrakensangOnline is the first browser-based action online RPG in the famous Drakensang saga that stands above the rest thanks to its visually-stunning graphics and detailed game world. CPA conversion will fire once user submits valid payment details.<br><br><b>Publisher Payouts:</b><br>http://www.tsxnrey.com/i/JMedia/ratepergeo<br><br>Typical Demographics:&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;<br>All

program.description: <p style="margin-bottom: 0.0001pt;"><span style="font-size: 8.5pt; font-family: Arial, sans-serif;">Exur products gives you the opportunity to make money from your home.</span></p><p style="margin-bottom: 0.0001pt;"><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size: 8.5pt; font-family: Arial, sans-serif;">Flow: The user only has to click in the banner, go to the landing page, fill 2 blanks and accept for the pixel to be fired.</span></p><p style="margin-bottom: 0.0001pt;"><span style="font-family: Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 8.5pt;">Read Term and Conditions.</span></p><p style="margin-bottom: 0.0001pt;"><span style="font-family: Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 8.5pt;"><br></span></p><p style="margin-bottom: 0.0001pt;"><span style="font-family: Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 8.5pt;">Los productos de Exur te dan la oportunidad de ganar dinero desde tu casa.</span></p><p style="margin-bottom: 0.0001pt;"><span style="font-family: Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 8.5pt;">Flow: El usuario da click en la landing para llegar al registro, llena 2 campos y al llegar a la thank you page se dispara el pixel.</span></p><p style="margin-bottom: 0.0001pt;">Leer terminos y condiciones</p>
